decision_conditions: <p>All new facing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution, and finished appearance.</p><p>Notwithstanding the above, and prior to the replacement of the existing roof tiles,&nbsp; samples of the proposed roof tiles including manufacturer's details, shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority in writing and the development shall be carried out as per the approved details.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: In the interests of the visual amenities of the surrounding area.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-f0e46d0e-7fff-99e3-0f89-05121d76d93b">Noise arising from the use of the air source heat pump or any associated equipment shall not increase the existing background noise level (LA90,15mins) when measured (LAeq, 15mins) 1 metre external from the nearest residential or noise sensitive premises. The applicant shall also ensure that vibration/structure borne noise derived from the use of the air source heat pump does not cause noise nuisance within residential or noise sensitive premises.</span></p><p>REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.</p><p><br></p>

<p>The development hereby approved shall provide two swift boxes close to the eaves of the mansard roof extension prior to first occupation and shall be retained as such in perpetuity.</p><p>REASON: In the interest of biodiversity.</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Proposed works: Installation of double glazed sash windows on the front elevation; the replacement of the existing casement windows on the rear elevation; the installation of an ASHP at the rear; the installation of PV panels at the rear; the installation of two rooflights on the front roof slope and two rooflights on the rear roof slope; alterations to the front yard including alterations to the boundary wall and the installation of a new bike store.
